comment.author: 82609930@N06
comment._content: This is Carol M. Highsmith.  I photographed the interior of the Thomas Jefferson Building over a period of two years.  This view, showing the entire ceiling, stained my neck as I focused, but it was so worth taking.  After I worked each day in this iconic building, I would rush home to view the images up close on my computer so I could study the detail.
